p: Three lineages were identified in N7 and N8, which correspond to North American avian (7A, 8A), equine (7C, 8B) and Eurasian/Oceanian avian (7B, 8C), respectively ( Table 1, Figure S4 and Figure 2-D). For N9, 3 lineages were identified: 9A, 9B and 9C, which correspond to North American avian, Eurasian/Oceanian avian I and Eurasian/Oceanian avian II, respectively ( Table 1, Figure S5). The genetic distances between lineages were found in the range from 0.297 to 0.320 for N7, from 0.269 to 0.298 for N8, and from 0.117 to 0.224 for N9, respectively.
